channel.title: Softlayer_hardware_component_attribute on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_hardware_component_attribute on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Attribute
item.description: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Attribute Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Attribute data type contains general information relating to a single hardware setting or attribute for a component model. For Example: A RAID controller may be setup for many different RAID configurations. A RAID controller with a configuration of RAID-1 will have a single attribute for this RAID setting. Local hardwareComponentAttributeTypeId A hardware component attribute's associated [[SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Attribute_Type|type]] Id. Type: integer
